greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,m) read by rows which contains the coefficients [x^m] of the polynomial generating the numerators of the column A140825(.,n).
comment: The first five polynomials describing the first five columns of A140825 are in A000012, A005408, A140811, A141530 and A157411.
reference: P Curtz Integration numerique des systemes differentiels a conditions initiales, C.C.S.A., Arcueil, 1969, p.36.
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Mar 10 2009
